pages.title: Crumble Horn
pages.text: The quest for colored wool has come to an end, resulting in the ram gifting me a horn. It almost seems to have the form of an instrument though, perhaps I should try blowing on it.

The horn has ended up with more value than just a nice mantle piece it seems. When blown in the presence of rock and earth, the sound coming from it resonates in such a way that the material crumbles like snow before the sun. Perhaps there is a way this can be automated in a useful way.
